original_text: If the Lord is pleased with us, he will lead us into that land, a land flowing with milk and honey, and will give it to us.
korean_text: 여호와께서 우리를 기뻐하시면 우리를 그 땅으로 인도하여 들이시고 그 땅을 우리에게 주시리라 이는 과연 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅이니라

sentences.original_text: If the Lord is pleased with us
he will lead us into that land
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리를 그 땅으로 인도하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: a land flowing with milk and honey
and will give it to us
